author: Rachel Bachman
title: Mikaela Shiffrin vs. Lindsey Vonn: Alpine Combined Provides a Rare Showdown
text:
PYEONGCHANG, South Korea—Americans Mikaela Shiffrin and Lindsey Vonn have opposite specialties in Alpine skiing and rarely compete against one another. Shiffrin is early in her career at age 22, and Vonn is close to the end at age 33.
So Thursday’s Alpine combined provides a rare showdown between two of the best female skiers in history. The winner of the combined has the fastest total time between one run of slalom—Shiffrin’s best event—and one of downhill—Vonn’s specialty. Each skier has two Olympic medals in their careers,...
